Reviews.Title: Bargain, fast laptop
Reviews.Author: Donald M. Feferman "Counselor"
Reviews.Content: The first one crashed after a few days.  It was quickly replaced.  The new one works great and is a bargain that the price I purchased it -- under $500.

Reviews.Title: What a mistake!
Reviews.Author: MARIA MILLER
Reviews.Content: Purchased this computer and when it arrived the charger didn't work.  When I contacted the company they stated they knew there was a problem with the transformer and issued me a $20.00 credit to buy another one.  So, I bought another one and when I hooked it up the computer said the battery is bad.  Now I am once again attempting contact with the seller and still don't have a computer that I can run via the battery (only plugged in) .  What a drag
